item.title: 2nd mini mw3 montage
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Quit posting these here, stop ripping your music with a tape recorder, and take everyones advice and put in FITTING editing with FITTING music

Also, what the hell is up with your channel? 380 subscribers with 602 video views? That means most of your subscribers have only seen two of your videos, and only once. Did you do some thing where you click a bunch of surveys and get subscribers in return? Every video before your MW3 videos have ~60 views.

And another thing: Both of your threads put together don’t even have 100 views, how did your videos come across 301+ views? Surely you didn’t suddenly gain 300 subscribers and they all decided to start watching your “good” montages.

Read full topic

item.title: 2nd mini mw3 montage
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

The editing is horrible. Can’t even tell whats going on in 90% of the clips with that stupid ass mark over each kill. Clean up your clips, keep them clean, and use nice transitions. Keep the kills following the major beats of the song, or find something unique to make your video stand out from the others.

Read full topic
